extension_desc: Launches a local development server with a live reload feature, so you can see your changes in real time.
Automatically formats your code according to a set of predefined rules, making your code more readable and consistent.
Provides IntelliSense support for Sass, making it easier to write Sass code.
Highlights TODO comments in your code, so you can easily find and track TODO items.
Automatically renames HTML tags when you rename the corresponding elements in your code.
Formats your code according to a set of predefined rules, making your code more readable and consistent
Checks your code for spelling errors, helping you to catch errors and potential problems in your code.
Provides linting support for JavaScript files, helping you to catch errors and potential problems in your code.
Provides linting support for TypeScript files, helping you to catch errors and potential problems in your code.
Provides AI-assisted IntelliSense suggestions for a variety of programming languages, making it easier to write code
Adds a library of icon fonts to VS Code, making it easier to add icons to your code.
Provides IntelliSense support for file paths, making it easier to write code that references files.
Provides a graphical representation of your GitHub activity, such as your commits, pull requests, and issues.
This extension allows you to view, manage, and interact with GitHub pull requests directly from VS Code.
This extension provides support for ES7+ features, React, Redux, and React Native.
This extension provides a more powerful and customizable Markdown preview experience.
The modern coding superpower: free AI code acceleration plugin for your favorite languages. Type less. Code more. Ship faster.
This extension provides a collection of code snippets for ReactJS, making it easier to write ReactJS code.
This extension provides a variety of features for working with React Native, such as a debugger, a simulator, and a code editor.
This extension provides a debugging tool for Redux applications, making it easier to find and fix bugs in your code.
This extension provides a collection of code snippets for Next.js, making it easier to write Next.js code.
This extension provides IntelliSense support for Tailwind CSS, making it easier to write Tailwind CSS code.
This extension provides IntelliSense support for Styled Components, making it easier to write Styled Components code.
This extension automatically formats your JS,CSS and HTML Formatter code according to a set of predefined rules, making your JS,CSS and HTML more readable and consistent.
This extension validates your CSS code against the CSS syntax rules, making it easier to find and fix errors in your CSS.
This extension highlights the different colors in your CSS code, making it easier to find and understand the different parts of your CSS.
Allows you to debug your code in Chrome, making it easier to find and fix bugs in your code.
